Description: Name of burn unit (i.e., Angel, 25 Mile, Sherman Creek, Chumstick ZUI, Paradise 90, Orion 2)
Sampling episode short name (i.e., PRE, POST)
Calendar date of wired log installation (DD-MMM-YY)
Category of sample material (i.e., "Grass", "Shrub", "Duff", "Litter", "Downed Woody: 1000-hr", "Downed Woody: 100-hr", "Downed Woody: 10-hr", "Downed Woody: 1-hr").
Gross wet weight (grams) of fuel moisture sample, as measured in the field.
Container weight (grams) of fuel moisture sample container.
Gross dry weight (grams) of fuel moisture sample, following 48 hours of oven-drying at either 70 degrees C (fine fuels), or 100 degrees C (heavy fuels).
Container weight (grams) of fuel moisture sample during oven drying.
